Portal is a game I would recommend to anyone who is either starting or coming back to video games after a long time. This game has amazing complex puzzles that will test your brain, i haven't finished the game but i am nearly at the end. The portal gun is a amazing tool that can be used in so many different ways. I recommend getting the portal bundle which comes with Portal 1 and 2. But Overall it is a Game worth the price and is a masterpiece

This is an excellent game. The story is fascinating and some of the puzzles are difficult but super easy once you figure them out. I think I will play this game again soon as it doesn't just make you have fun but it intellectually stimulates you with the problems. This is a must play on anyone's gaming list.
e

Portal is a very unique game. It's a brain-twister that has you thinking in ways you've never even thought that you'd think of before. As the name and literally everything else around it implies, the main game mechanic is utilizing portals to solve puzzles. I'd explain in-depth about how the portals work, but I don't need to because Portal is also one of the most intuitively designed games out there. It's capable of communicating all of its mechanics with minimal prompting (in most cases), so by the end of the few hours it takes to beat the game, you won't have any trouble thinking with portals. As such, this game also makes for a good entry point for video games in general. 
Additionally, the game contains a few bonus features once you beat the game: Developer Commentary, Advanced Chambers, and Challenges. You also will see a lot more radios around the test chambers, all of which now bearing red lights. These were once part of an ARG leading up to the release of Portal 2. Yeah, they made an ARG. Definitely worth the google.
